column4: How do I make clicking on URL's from other programs actually open in Firefox?  For example, when clicking on an applications homepage link in Add/Remove, nothing happens...
that is something that needs to be implemented at the application level, on the case of the Add/Remove application there is no support to visit the links
Then why do the developers make the links blue?  Isn't it common knowledge that blue links (link by definition suggests the ability to visit them) are clickable? :)
well, maybe you should file a bug report for it :)
